includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: When mild-mannered chemistry teacher Walter White is diagnosed with cancer, he begins cooking and selling methamphetamine to financially provide for his family.

includedIn.title: Breaking Bad
includedIn.synopsis: When mild-mannered chemistry teacher Walter White is diagnosed with cancer, he decides to risk everything to ensure his family's future. Teaming up with low-level drug dealer Jesse Pinkman, Walt begins cooking and selling methamphetamine to make some quick cash, but the pair gradually become immersed in a dark and dangerous new world.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: A mild-mannered chemistry teacher turns his talents to cooking meth after he's diagnosed with cancer.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: When mild-mannered chemistry teacher Walter White is diagnosed with cancer, he decides to risk everything to ensure his family's future. Teaming up with low-level drug dealer Jesse Pinkman, Walt begins cooking and selling methamphetamine to make some quick cash, but the pair gradually become immersed in a dark and dangerous new world.

title: Breaking Bad: The Complete Series
synopsis: Bryan Cranston gives the performance of a lifetime in this Emmy and Golden Globe-winning drama. Cranston stars as mild-mannered chemistry teacher Walter White who turns his life on its head when he's diagnosed with cancer. Desperate to make sure his family are provided for, he teams up with low-level drug dealer Jesse Pinkman (Aaron Paul) to cook and sell methamphetamine. But the pair become more and more immersed in a dark and dangerous world that threatens to swallow them whole. Anna Gunn and Dean Norris also star in this must-watch modern classic.
shortSynopsis: Acclaimed drama starring Bryan Cranston as a teacher who takes drastic measures to provide for his family after he is diagnosed with cancer.
mediumSynopsis: Bryan Cranston gives the performance of a lifetime in this Emmy and Golden Globe-winning drama. Cranston stars as mild-mannered chemistry teacher Walter White who turns his life on its head when he's diagnosed with cancer. Desperate to make sure his family are provided for, he teams up with low-level drug dealer Jesse Pinkman (Aaron Paul) to cook and sell methamphetamine. But the pair become more and more immersed in a dark and dangerous world that threatens to swallow them whole. Anna Gunn and Dean Norris also star in this must-watch modern classic.
guidanceText: flashing images, strong language, mature themes, sex, violence
